overview:
Peter Bae is the co-founder and SVP at Fantage.com Inc., a popular virtual world and community sites for young kids. He has been involved in start-up community 9 years with directly founding 4 and helping many others.

Most recently he was a founding member and former CEO of BayAreaKGroup, a non-profit organization established for networking and supporting Korean-American hi-tech professionals in the Northern California bay area.

He currently leads the business development at Fantage.com, one of the biggest and fastest growing casual game site for young children.
